TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create and exchange GeometricDefinition information of an Organisation and a Unit in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an Organisation and a Unit, each with a specific GeometricDefinition. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Organisation and Unit message schema areas. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the organisation and unit are created and all elements are processed and interpreted correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a message element for an example Organisation and an example Unit, each with a specific GeometricDefinition.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays both objects correctly.
